level.heading: Sunshine provisions.
level.text: Collective bargaining sessions between the District and employee organization representatives shall not be open to the public. All fact-finding proceedings under this subchapter shall be open to the public.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-139
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-139, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 1-601.01.
